org.usgs.manifold.packet.earthworm

Class TraceBufferPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usgs.manifold.packet.earthworm.EarthwormPacket
      • org.usgs.manifold.packet.earthworm.TraceBufferPacket

  • public class TraceBufferPacket
extends EarthwormPacket
    Represents an Earthworm TraceBuffer (a data element relating to waveforms). Used to communicate sensor web data to Earthworm devices that are connected to this server, especially the database importer (ImportEW).

    • Constructor Detail

      • TraceBufferPacket

        public TraceBufferPacket()
        Construct a default TraceBufferPacket with test data to check transmission and message construction functionality.

      • TraceBufferPacket

        public TraceBufferPacket(int stationNum,
                 java.lang.String networkID,
                 java.lang.String channelName,
                 double startTime,
                 double endTime,
                 double sampleRate,
                 int[] data)
        Construct a TraceBufferPacket from actual data obtained from the sensor web. This is the standard constructor for real (i.e. non-test) trace buffer packets.
        Parameters:
        stationNum - Source of this waveform
        channelName - Channel of this waveform
        startTime - Time of first sample point
        endTime - Time of last sample point
        sampleRate - Sampling frequency (in Hz)
        data - The data samples

      • TraceBufferPacket

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Creates a global map of station names to ID numbers

      • getStation

        public static java.lang.String getStation(int stationNum)
        Retrieves the 3-letter string representing the station (source of the waveform). If the station number has been assigned a name in the station map, that will be returned, otherwise a default name of N + stationNum will be returned.
        Parameters:
        stationNum - the id number of the waveform source
        Returns:
        the appropriate 3-length String to represent the station

      • getMessageBody

        public byte[] getMessageBody()
        Converts the fields and data contained in this packet into a flat byte array for transmission via TCP. Creation of flags and tacking on the appropriate header is handled by the superclass. All this method returns is the acutal payload of data.
        Specified by:
        getMessageBody in class EarthwormPacket
        Returns:
        the payload of this tracebuffer

      • getEndTime

        public double getEndTime()
        Retrieves the end time contained in this packet (for sanity checks)
        Returns:
        the end time as seen by this packet.
